title: Fragile: Byourii Kishi Keiichirou no Shoken
original_name: フラジャイル～病理医岸京一郎の所見～
sinopse:
The manga centers around Keiichirou Kishi, a pathologist who advises doctors on their diagnoses and whose judgement is greatly trusted. Often, doctors remark that he is an eccentric person, but is good at what he does.

(Source: ANN)
